radiographic_examinations.findings: Multifocal abnormal FDG uptake in the right thorax with SUVmax ranging from 1.4 to 2.7; abnormal FDG uptake also seen in the chest wall. Faint infiltrative opacities noted in both lungs.
radiographic_examinations.changes_over_time: Lung lesions gradually and spontaneously regressed on follow-up CT images, with disappearance or shrinkage of the lesions observed.
